short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds the storefront of the hot goods you might like

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds the storefront of the hot goods you might like.
It won't sell you anything, it just gets the actual feed of hot goods from all around the globe and provides it to you!

How to Use
------------
1. Add this extension to Chrome.
2. Filter the goods by your own criteria.
3. Enjoy the storefront of hot sale stuff in the new tabs.
